page.title: 10STAFFORD-RIVERSIDE CENTRE
page.content: The Riverside centre was built in 1974. It was opened in March 1974 by Councillor Simpson and Stafford Borough Council own the centre. There are 65 people on the staff. There are many different facilities such as swimming, judo, tennis, keep fit,football,roller skating, yoga, gymnastics,weight training, karate and archery. The favourite sport is swimming. There is a female changing room and a male changing room for swimming. They have a meeting room, there is a tuck shop and there is a bar where you can get food and drink. The centre is open every day of the week and is open for 103.75 hrs in a whole week. They had 6,000 people in one week in 1983. 131 school classes come to the centre to swim for half hour lessons.
